thread.title: Fab place
thread.title_full: Fab place - Review of Spier Wine Farm, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Sam H
title: Fab place
text:
What a fantastic vineyard and winery. We opted for the signature tasting and we were not disappointed. The server explained the wines well and was very informative.
The grounds are stunning, after we wondered happily through the grounds, we opted for a spot of lunch at the Hogshead. Fantastic simple, but perfectly cooked n served food.
A superb way to spend an afternoon I the beautiful sunshine.
